title: Status Bar
description: Describes how we augment the status bar

steps.description:
### Activation
The status bar provider is registered upon extension activiation

### Registration
If the currently opened workspace has any code tours, then we register the `Start Code Tour` status bar item.

### Waiting for user
Using MobX, we wait for the user to start and/or navigate a code tour.

### Updating
When a tour is activate and/or navigated, we update the status bar item to indicate the current step and title.
